decks.notes: This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The key strategy is to play low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Callous Sell-Sword, then use pump spells like Titan's Strength and Monstrous Rage to deal massive damage in a short amount of time. The deck also includes burn spells like Fatal Push and Reckless Rage to clear the way for attackers. By combining fast creatures with direct damage spells, this deck aims to win the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with cards like Consider and Ledger Shredder to bring back Arclight Phoenix and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures. The deck also includes a mix of burn spells like Fiery Impulse and Lightning Axe to control the board and protect its creatures. With a balanced mix of card draw and counterspells, the deck aims to maintain a steady stream of threats while disrupting the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of cards like Picklock Prankster and Profit's Eidetic Memory add versatility and unpredictability to the deck's strategy.

The deck focuses on playing low-cost Spirit creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. By using cards like Skyclave Apparition and Spell Queller to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while also buffing their own creatures with Supreme Phantom, the deck aims to close out the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Collected Company allows for explosive turns and the ability to flood the board with creatures. Ultimately, the goal is to maintain pressure and tempo to secure victory.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on creating early board presence with creatures like Cauldron Familiar and Gilded Goose, supported by cards like Trail of Crumbs and Witch's Oven for card advantage and recursion. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and The Meathook Massacre to control the board and clear the way for attackers. Vraska, Golgari Queen provides additional value and threat, while cards like Scavenger's Talent and Ygra, Eater of All help to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base includes a mix of dual lands and utility lands to ensure consistent casting of spells.

This deck focuses on fast and aggressive gameplay, utilizing creatures with strong damage-dealing abilities to quickly defeat the opponent. With cards like Torbran, Thane of Red Fell and Goblin Chainwhirler boosting damage output, combined with burn spells like Spikefield Hazard and Chandra, Dressed to Kill, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to establish their own board presence. The inclusion of land cards like Den of the Bugbear and Sokenzan, Crucible of Defiance provide additional utility and options for closing out games.
